page.title: 14Employment.Hospital Surgeon
page.content: My dad is an oral and maxilo facial surgeon.He works at St. Lawrence Hospital,Chepstow.He starts work at about 09.00. Sometimes he finishes at 17.00 and somedays he's on call 24 hours a day.He gets patients from other hospitals as well as patients from this area directly.Sometimes he has to take portions of skin and bone from elsewhere in the body to reconstruct the face following serious injuries from car accidents etc. He works at the department for oral surgery.He does operations twice a week in the operating theatre.There are 3 units in the hospital which are the Burns Unit,Plastic Surgery Unit and Maxilo Facial Surgery Unit containing about 20 wards for in-patients.
